Articles.Content:
Good Morning,Evening Etc. Fellow kerbal Space Explorers

Today i was enjoying my accomplishment of finally making a working space station when i came to realize that when i finished and it was there, i had nothing else to do, it just felt boring looking at it and i felt that if they

added a interactive inside like floating around going to different sections of you station or just looking around on the inside instead of out it would be a bit more satisfying. this idea has been boggling with my head and i am a bit curious

if it has boggled yours. please give me some feedback if this is a good idea and if KSP should implement it cause i think it would add a bit more interactivity in KSP. Altough KSP is very busy with its Heavy Development i would like to

say that it is doing an amazing job and its going to be an amazing game if it keeps going on the path that its on. thank you for reading my lil idea and i hope you have a fun day

While I agree, this is on the what not to suggest list as "More IVA views" since it has been suggested innumerable times.

This is also on the planned features list on the wiki as Enhanced IVAs.

As mentioned, this is indeed on the [thread=36863]What Not to Suggest list[/thread].

Thread locked
